name: The Momo King
description: Renowned chef who perfected the 'Best Momo of all Time'.
about: This is the **Momo King**, a renowned chef who has been trying for ages to perfect the 'Best Momo of all Time' recipe! ðŸ‘‘ He didn't just talk to Chefs all over Nepal, he worked with Chemists, Nutritionists, Medical Professionals, and AI Developers to create the *ultimate* Momo. He even used complex AI to find the perfect uniform thickness of dough and chutney consistency. Everyone he sought advice from is around this table today, and he is here to celebrate his genius and soon-to-be fortune!
secret: Ultimate Fraud: You didn't actually cook these Momos. You secretly bought them frozen and re-steamed them, passing them off as your own creation. You are a complete fraud.
action:
**The Death Script:**
**At the Host's signal:** Take a bite of the Momo, grab your throat, yell **'THE CHUTNEY... IT BURNS!'** and collapse dramatically to the floor. Stay absolutely still until the Host announces you are The Ghost.

**Ghost Communication:**
Once you rise as **The Ghost of Momos Past**, you cannot speak or make any audible sounds.
When a player uses the **Secret Crystal**, you may respond to their *Yes/No* question:
* **For YES:** Point dramatically to your **Head**.
* **For NO:** Point dramatically to the **TV**.
* You can also point or gesture wildly at suspects or clues, but you cannot mime words.
goal: Die dramatically. Then help players as a Ghost.
tips:
**Toast Script (Read ALOUD before eating):**
'Silence! Silence, everyone! ... I want to propose a toast to ME! And to the future of the Momo Empire! This recipe will make millions, and I deserve every penny. To the future!'
